content: Hi, Welcome to my website #My name is Arian Shahrabi this website is under construction at the moment
title: Welcome to Arian.ca

content:
Hi, #I specialize in C++, AI behavior, and physics-based gameplay. I like solving hard technical problems and making them feel effortless in-game.
What I’m best at #C++, SFML, Unity, Unreal AI behavior trees & state machines Physics & custom simulation tools Performance profiling & optimization Recent highlight #Shaved 30% frame time on a cloth sim by refactoring constraints and batching collisions. See project
How I work #Bias for clarity, fast iteration, and measurable results. I prototype early, test with real inputs, and improve from there.
Want the short version?
View Projects • Download Resume • ContactEvents I’ve Attended #TFS Fest 2025Jun 19, 2025XP Game Summit 2025May 30, 2025Level Up 2025Apr 12, 2025
